answers.answer: It could be cataract, or stroke or diabetes or something else. You should have an ophthalmologist and you should ask that Eye MD.JCH MD

question: i have contracted type 2 diabetes, was diagnosed with cataract on left eye after mild stroke. it now seems that my eyes do not adjust to light very well, glare bothers me, then when its cloudy, i cant see very well. could this be the diabetes or something related to the stroke.           thank you
title: darking of sight
